description.zh-cn: 古代中国在中央集权的政治体制下采用郡、县二级地方政府的行政制度，取代封建制成为中国历史上的主要政治体制。
description.en: An administrative system in ancient China under a centralized political structure, utilizing commanderies (jun) and counties (xian) as a two-tiered local government. It replaced the feudal system to become the primary political system in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 郡县制的主要实行地区。
description.en: The primary region where the commandery and county system was implemented.

description.zh-cn: 一种政治体制，郡县制是在此体制下采用的行政制度。
description.en: A political system under which the commandery and county system was adopted.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继商朝之后的朝代，郡县制起源于此时期。
description.en: The dynasty in Chinese history that followed the Shang dynasty, during which the commandery and county system originated.

description.zh-cn: 周朝时期的主要政治制度，后被郡县制取代。
description.en: The primary political system during the Zhou dynasty, later replaced by the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上第一个大一统王朝，正式在全国范围内推行郡县制。
description.en: The first unified dynasty in Chinese history, which formally implemented the commandery and county system nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 继秦朝之后的大一统王朝，承袭并发展了郡县制。
description.en: A unified dynasty following the Qin dynasty, which inherited and developed the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 汉字文化圈国家，从中国学习并实行了郡县制。
description.en: A country in the Sinosphere that learned and implemented a form of the commandery and county system from China.

description.zh-cn: 汉字文化圈国家，从中国学习并实行了郡县制。
description.en: A country in the Sinosphere that learned and implemented a form of the commandery and county system from China.

description.zh-cn: 汉字文化圈国家，从中国学习并实行了郡县制。
description.en: A country in the Sinosphere that learned and implemented a form of the commandery and county system from China.

description.zh-cn: 春秋战国时期的大国，较早实行县制。
description.en: A major state during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods that was an early adopter of the county system.

description.zh-cn: 春秋时期的大国，曾设县以加强中央集权。
description.en: A major state during the Spring and Autumn period that established counties to strengthen central power.

description.zh-cn: 郡县制中的二级行政单位。
description.en: The second-tier administrative unit in the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上首位完成华夏大一统的政治人物，采纳李斯建议，在全国推行郡县制。
description.en: The first political figure to unify China, who adopted Li Si's suggestion to implement the commandery and county system nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝丞相，力排众议主张实行郡县制。
description.en: Chancellor of the Qin dynasty who strongly advocated for the implementation of the commandery and county system against other opinions.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝初期实行的一种郡县制与分封制并行的政治体制。
description.en: A political system in the early Han dynasty that combined the commandery and county system with the feudal enfeoffment system.

description.zh-cn: 发生于西汉景帝时期的一次诸侯国叛乱，平定后诸侯国权力被极大削弱，郡县制成为主体。
description.en: A rebellion by vassal states during the reign of Emperor Jing of the Western Han. After its suppression, the power of the vassal states was greatly weakened, and the commandery and county system became dominant.

description.zh-cn: 唐代文学家、思想家，撰写《封建论》阐发了郡县制的优越性。
description.en: A writer and thinker of the Tang dynasty who wrote 'On Feudalism' to elaborate on the superiority of the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 柳宗元的政论文章，论证了郡县制优于封建制度。
description.en: A political essay by Liu Zongyuan arguing that the commandery and county system is superior to the feudal system.

description.zh-cn: 日本的一次古代政治、经济改革，自此开始使用“郡”作为行政区划。
description.en: An ancient political and economic reform in Japan, which introduced the 'Gun' (郡) as an administrative division.

description.zh-cn: 日本的行政区划单位，仿照中国制度设立，后被废止，现仅作为地理名词。
description.en: An administrative unit in Japan, established in imitation of the Chinese system, later abolished, and now used only as a geographical term.

description.zh-cn: 1878年日本制定的一系列地方制度法律，恢复了“郡”作为行政区划。
description.en: A series of local government laws enacted in Japan in 1878, which restored the 'Gun' (郡) as an administrative division.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治家，坚持通过了日本的郡制。
description.en: A Japanese politician who insisted on the passage of the Japanese County System.

description.zh-cn: 1890年日本公布的有关郡的地方自治制度，后于1923年被废除。
description.en: The local autonomy system concerning counties promulgated in Japan in 1890, which was later abolished in 1923.

description.zh-cn: 历史上的德意志国家，其地方制度是日本郡制的模仿对象。
description.en: A historical German state whose local system was a model for the Japanese county system.

description.zh-cn: 此次战争导致的资本主义发展和社会变化，冲击了日本的地方名望家支配体制，并催生了大正民主运动。
description.en: The capitalist development and social changes caused by this war impacted Japan's local elite dominance system and gave rise to the Taishō Democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 日本大正时期的民主主义和自由主义运动，其兴起导致了郡制的废除。
description.en: A democratic and liberal movement during Japan's Taishō period, the rise of which led to the abolition of the county system.

description.zh-cn: 郡县制是在中央集权的政治体制下采用的行政制度，以实现由上至下的管理。
description.en: The commandery and county system was an administrative system adopted under the political framework of centralized government to achieve top-down management.

description.zh-cn: 郡县制起源于周朝，起初作为封建制的补充。
description.en: The commandery and county system originated in the Zhou dynasty, initially as a supplement to the feudal system.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝在大一统后改进并全面推行郡县制。
description.en: After unifying the country, the Qin dynasty improved and fully implemented the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝承袭并发展了郡县制，使其成为后世地方政制的基础。
description.en: The Han dynasty inherited and developed the commandery and county system, making it the foundation for later local political systems.

description.zh-cn: 经过秦汉的发展，郡县制最终取代封建制成为中国历史上的主要政治体制。
description.en: After its development during the Qin and Han dynasties, the commandery and county system eventually replaced the feudal system as the main political system in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 时任廷尉的李斯力排众议，主张实行郡县制，并得到秦始皇的采纳。
description.en: As Commandant of Justice, Li Si strongly advocated for the implementation of the commandery and county system against other opinions, and his proposal was adopted by Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇采纳了李斯的建议，在统一天下后全面实行郡县制。
description.en: Qin Shi Huang adopted Li Si's suggestion and fully implemented the commandery and county system after unifying the country.

description.zh-cn: 李斯在秦始皇时期担任廷尉等重要职务。
description.en: Li Si held important positions such as Commandant of Justice during the reign of Qin Shi Huang.

description.zh-cn: 吴楚七国之乱被平定后，汉朝诸侯国的权力被极大削弱，削弱了分封制。
description.en: After the Rebellion of the Seven States was suppressed, the power of the vassal states in the Han dynasty was greatly weakened, which undermined the feudal enfeoffment system.

description.zh-cn: 吴楚七国之乱后，郡县制成为汉朝政治体制的主体。
description.en: After the Rebellion of the Seven States, the commandery and county system became the main body of the Han dynasty's political structure.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝建立之初，实行郡县制与分封制并行的郡国制。
description.en: In its early days, the Han dynasty implemented the Jun-Guo system, a parallel system of commanderies and counties alongside enfeoffed kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 柳宗元撰写了政论文章《封建论》。
description.en: Liu Zongyuan wrote the political essay 'On Feudalism'.

description.zh-cn: 《封建论》阐发了郡县制的优越性。
description.en: 'On Feudalism' elaborates on the superiority of the commandery and county system.

description.zh-cn: 《封建论》认为中国封建制度是百害而无一利。
description.en: 'On Feudalism' argues that the feudal system in China was entirely detrimental.

description.zh-cn: 日本从中国学习了郡县制，并结合本国情况加以实行。
description.en: Japan learned the commandery and county system from China and implemented it with adaptations to its own conditions.

description.zh-cn: 日本自646年的大化改新后开始使用“郡”作为行政区划。
description.en: Japan began using 'Gun' (郡) as an administrative division after the Taika Reform of 646.

description.zh-cn: 1878年制定的三新法恢复了“郡”作为行政区划。
description.en: The Three New Laws enacted in 1878 restored 'Gun' (郡) as an administrative division.

description.zh-cn: 山县有朋坚持通过了郡制，使其成为法律。
description.en: Yamagata Aritomo insisted on the passage of the County System, making it law.

description.zh-cn: 日本的郡制模仿了普鲁士的地方自治制度。
description.en: The Japanese county system was modeled after the local autonomy system of Prussia.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战导致的资本主义发达和社会矛盾激化，催生了大正民主运动。
description.en: The development of capitalism and intensified social conflicts caused by World War I gave rise to the Taishō Democracy movement.

description.zh-cn: 大正民主运动兴起，冲击了地方名望家支配体制，最终导致郡制在1923年遭到废除。
description.en: The rise of the Taishō Democracy movement challenged the local elite dominance system, ultimately leading to the abolition of the county system in 1923.
